trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Command" name="Command" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Command" name="Command" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The `Command` event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O `Command` é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>botão controle em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objeto é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs class is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to access information about the event that was raised.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs é usada internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos para acessar informações sobre o evento que foi gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs class, see the DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs, consulte o construtor DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle ao gerar eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial de uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>| O valor de `item` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O valor de `commandSource` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"> </xref> objeto que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: The original event data that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento original que contém o <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O controle que disparou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"> </xref> objeto que contém o controle que disparou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de Item para recuperar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the pager field object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade representa o objeto de campo do pager que contém o controle que disparou o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade representa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"> </xref> objeto que contém o controle que disparou o evento.
